alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 1:47PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NAVAJO COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM MST... At 147 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Woodruff, or 30 miles north of Show Low, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodruff. This includes State Route 77 between mile markers 372 and 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
